content.raw: Since I wrote most of the code for this PR, I will be addressing comments with Mohamd during the review process. This PR is mostly about upgrading to the new C++ V8 interface, but it also deals with images, because the  "jpeg" amd "png" packages have not been updated. The new code uses jimp (for jpeg) and png-js (for png).
content.html: Since I wrote most of the code for this PR, I will be addressing comments with Mohamd during the review process. This PR is mostly about upgrading to the new C++ V8 interface, but it also deals with images, because the "jpeg" amd "png" packages have not been updated. The new code uses jimp (for jpeg) and png-js (for png).
